trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that sends information to a printer.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um controlador de impressão que envia informações a uma impressora.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> uses this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> usa essa classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information on printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como imprimir, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> visão geral do namespace.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> que contém dados sobre como imprimir uma página no documento.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Conclui a sequência de controle que determina quando e como uma página de um documento será impressa.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se uma exceção é gerada dentro de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> não for chamado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que é enviado para a impressora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is called from a printing context of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting> is required.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> é chamado de um contexto de impressão de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting> é necessária.

trans-unit.source: Printing to the default printer requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.DefaultPrinting>.
trans-unit.target: Imprimir na impressora padrão requer um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.DefaultPrinting>.

trans-unit.source: All other calls this method requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting>
trans-unit.target: Esse método requer que todas as outras chamadas de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting>

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not finish writing to a page.
trans-unit.target: A API (Interface de Programação de Aplicativo) nativa do Win32 não pôde concluir a gravação em uma página.

trans-unit.source: for controlling access to printers.
trans-unit.target: para controlar o acesso a impressoras.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração de relacionados: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> que contém dados sobre como imprimir o documento.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Conclui a sequência de controle que determina quando e como um documento será impresso.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> é chamado imediatamente após <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the printing process, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo se uma exceção não tratada foi lançada durante o processo de impressão, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que é enviado para a impressora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not complete the print job.
trans-unit.target: A API (Interface de Programação de Aplicativo) nativa do Win32 não pôde concluir o trabalho de impressão.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 API could not delete the specified device context (DC).
trans-unit.target: A API nativa do Win32 não pôde excluir o DC (contexto de dispositivo) especificado.

trans-unit.source: for controlling access to printers.
trans-unit.target: para controlar o acesso a impressoras.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração de relacionados: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> que contém dados sobre como imprimir uma página no documento.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics" /> property of this parameter will be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics" /> deste parâmetro será <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument,System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs)" /> method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado do método <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument,System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs)" /> será usado para definir este propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a sequência de controle que determina quando e como uma página de um documento será impressa.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object that represents a page from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que representa uma página de um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto usado na impressão.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not prepare the printer driver to accept data.
trans-unit.target: A API (Interface de Programação de Aplicativo) nativa do Win32 não pôde preparar o driver da impressora para aceitar dados.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 API could not update the specified printer or plotter device context (DC) using the specified information.
trans-unit.target: A API nativa do Win32 não pôde atualizar o DC (contexto do dispositivo) da plotadora ou impressora especificada usando as informações especificadas.

trans-unit.source: for controlling access to printers.
trans-unit.target: para controlar o acesso a impressoras.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração de relacionados: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> que contém dados sobre como imprimir o documento.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a sequência de controle que determina quando e como um documento será impresso.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado imediatamente após <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto usado na impressão.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> verifica se as configurações da impressora são válidas.

trans-unit.source: The printer settings are not valid.
trans-unit.target: As configurações da impressora não são válidas.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not start a print job.
trans-unit.target: A API (Interface de Programação de Aplicativo) nativa do Win32 não pode iniciar um trabalho de impressão.

trans-unit.source: for controlling access to printers.
trans-unit.target: para controlar o acesso a impressoras.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração relacionada: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel" />
